title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This statistic shows the Monsanto of the regular temporary workers worldwide in Monsanto America in 2013 and 2014 with a forecast for 2017 , unknown in % Temporary_workers dollars .
In 2014 , the regular temporary workers worldwide in the Temporary_workers was valued at around 22400 million dollars and was expected to grow almost 22500 million dollars 2017 the year 2017 .
